attributes.action: elevate former prime minister of the Commonwealth of Australia, John Winston Howard, to the peerage of the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In November 2007, John Howard concluded his 11 years as one of the most successful prime ministers in Australian history.

In recognition of this, John Howard is deserving of being honoured in the only appropriate way for a former Commonwealth prime minister.

Through his elevation to the peerage, John Howard will be given a platform to continue his contribution to the Anglosphere.
